page.name: Web Cloud
page.page_description: Welcome to the Web Cloud status page for real-time information on system performance and availability.
page.headline: Web Cloud OVHcloud Status : incidents, maintenance
page.notifications_email_footer: You received this email because you are subscribed to Web Cloud's service status notifications.

incidents.name: [GRA][WebHosting] - Cluster024
incidents.message: Start Time : 26/06/2023 11:58 UTC End Time : 26/06/2023 16:00 UTC Root cause : Incident due to this related incident https://public-cloud.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/qjtn6d0wll3n Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

incidents.name: [SBG/RBX/GRA/BRU][Core Network] - Call routing
incidents.message: Start time : 07/06/2023 06:32 UTC End time : 07/06/2023 15:11 UTC On Wednesday June 7th at 8:27 AM (CET), a network malfunction impacted the VoIP services of some of our customers. OVHcloud technical teams immediately intervened to identify the cause of the incident and resolve it. Impacted services have been restored on 07/06/2023 15:11 UTC and are now operational. You can contact our customer service on 1007 or open a support ticket from your Help Center. We apologize for any inconvenience this may has caused. We will update our support pages with new information as soon as available.
incidents.timestamp: Jun <var data-var='date'>7</var>, <var data-var='time'>06:59</var> - Jun <var data-var='date'>8</var>, <var data-var='time'>16:25</var> UTC
